verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> They that <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be as <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4131>removed,<s%> but <S%H3427>stays<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

As the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5439>round<s%> about his <S%H5971>people<s%> from now <S%H6258>on<s%> even for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

For the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H5117>rest<s%> on the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H4616>lest<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%>
Do <S%H2895>good,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to those that be <S%H2896>good,<s%> and to them that are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in their <S%H3826>hearts.<s%>

As for such as <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> to their <S%H6128>crooked<s%> ways, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3212>lead<s%> them forth with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity:<s%> but <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be on <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
